mapper.select: select plan_id , plan_code , plan_title , plan_writer , plan_regdate from procurement_plan order by plan_regdate desc

select pl.plan_id AS plan_id , pl.plan_code AS plan_code , pl.plan_title AS plan_title , pl.plan_writer AS plan_writer , pl.plan_regdate AS plan_regdate , pp.pp_quantity AS pp_quantity , pp.pp_delivery_date AS pp_delivery_date , pp.pp_total_price AS pp_total_price , p.p_id AS p_id , p.p_name AS p_name , p.p_price AS p_price from plan_product pp join procurement_plan pl on pp.plan_id = pl.plan_id join product p on pp.p_id = p.p_id where pp.plan_id = #{plan_id}
select plan_code from procurement_plan where plan_code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix} , '%') order by plan_code desc limit 1
